sources.name: STGACCT2
sources.script:
source(output(
		ACCT_ID as decimal(10,0),
		ACCT_TYP as string,
		ACCT_DESC as string,
		CASH as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> STGACCT2

sinks.name: CUSTDTLSUMRY1
sinks.script:
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CUSTDTLSUMRY1

transformations.name: EXPTRANS
transformations.script:
STGACCT2 derive(ACCT_ID = ACCT_ID,
		ACCT_TYP = ACCT_TYP,
		ACCT_DESC = ACCT_DESC,
		CASH = CASH) ~> EXPTRANS
